max(budget_year) as budget_year
budget_year
FROM bonus_budget where delete_flag = 0
and budget_year=#{deptBonusBudget.budgetYear}

SELECT dbb.dept_bonus_budget_id, dbb.budget_year, dbb.strategy_award_percentage, dbb.delete_flag, dbb.create_by, dbb.create_time, dbb.update_by, dbb.update_time FROM dept_bonus_budget dbb WHERE dbb.budget_year = #{budgetYear} and dbb.delete_flag = 0

budget_year=#{deptBonusBudget.budgetYear},

create_by=#{deptBonusBudget.createBy},
create_time=#{deptBonusBudget.createTime},

update_time=#{deptBonusBudget.updateTime}
WHERE dept_bonus_budget_id=#{deptBonusBudget.deptBonusBudgetId}
